Post-Match Reflections: Chicago White Sox interim manager Grady Sizemore stated that the team had some opportunities where they didn't score runs and hit into double plays, which was frustrating.

Miscellaneous Highlights: Chicago White Sox lost their 111th game of the season, extending their franchise record.

The White Sox lost 14 of their last 15 games.
